title: People can't park
content: does anyone know who the fuck this is he parked his bike literally touching the side and the front tire to my back tire and i had to wait for someone to come and help move the bike to a standing position to remove my bike fucking stupid mfs can't park like a normal fucking person

comments.body: Have you seen people park directly on top of that white line? I thought ignorance and mindlessness have reached the lowest. They define a new low everyday
But the image that u posted doesn't showcase ur problem, ppl literally can't understand
apologies next time he does it I'll take a picture unfortunately I got too pissed

I have faced this issue too, not once but thrice..  they have scratched my vehicle too. 

I will make sure I leave a very evident key scratch if they do it again , trust me its very annoying to face this..

Bro if they literally push their piece of junk on your vehicle don't even give a shit about scratching their vehicle while getting it out   
These jerks deserve it
to all who downvoted my comment, have a look at my post
Check my post, you will understand what OP is trying to say
